# title

**Instance Property**

The title for the color picker.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var title: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to explain what kind of color to pick, like “Stroke Color” or “Fill Color”.

## Configuring color picker attributes

- **maximumLinearExposure**: The maximum exposure to apply to a color when returned by the color well.
- **supportsAlpha**: A Boolean value that determines whether the color picker supports alpha values.
- **supportsEyedropper**: If set to `NO` the eyedropper functionality is not supported for this color well.
- **selectedColor**: The selected color in the color picker.
